GSD.description:
efi: Do not import certificates from UEFI Secure Boot for T2 Macs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit b1cda6dd2c44771f042d65f0d17bec322ef99a0a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: efi: Do not import certificates from UEFI Secure Boot for T2 Macs
